ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: Can anyone say... Bracer of Erollisi?  That s would be my number one bet to be deity specific. Kit fortunately I worship Erollisi ... From: Mike Roach
ygData.messageBody:
Can anyone say... Bracer of Erollisi? That's would be my number one bet to
be deity specific.

Kit
"fortunately I worship Erollisi"

-----Original Message-----
From: Mike Roach [mailto:Mike.Roach@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 1:51 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message


Is it just me or does this part concern anyone a bit:

"Items have gained the ability to be restricted by Deity. If a deity
restriction is placed upon an item, it will show when you
right-click-and-hold on the item."

I chose Tunare as my deity so many moons ago when I started Faras (April 11,
1999 - today is my one year anniversary in EQ) because I wanted to RP a
tree-hugging nature bard type, the mother of all and so forth. There have
been times I wished I had chosen Bristlebane but I still think Tunare better
goes with how I play than Bristlebane does.

At any rate, I wonder what weapons I have that the Momma of All might
suddenly find unnaceptable...nothing like a hen-pecking mother to spoil the
fun.

-Faras
